thread.title: 80 anniversary match: Kotoko, Varia FC game postponed to November 15
thread.title_full: 80 anniversary match: Kotoko, Varia FC game postponed to November 15

title: 80 anniversary match: Kotoko, Varia FC game postponed to November 15
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 18:10 CET 80 anniversary match: Kotoko, Varia FC game postponed to November 15 - www.allsports.com.gh 
Asante Kotoko 80 anniversary international friendly game against Varia FC of Greece which was scheduled to happen on 11 November has been postponed to 15 November, 2015 
Originally Kotoko were supposed to play their 80 anniversary match against Petrolul of Romania on 5 September, but they were replaced by Varia and the date was rescheduled to 11 October. 
However, Pacific Ghana Limited, who are the organisers have postponed the date for the game, but the opponent remains the same this time around. 
A former assistant Coach of Greece's national team and technical director of Veria FC, Zisis Vryzas is leading officials of his club to Kumasi next week. 
A press conference will take place on October 14 at the Golden Tulip Hotel where details of Veria's travel arrangement and other information will be made known. 
The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Pacific Ghana Limited, Eric Oppong-Yeboah disclosed this to Asantekotokosc.com. 
He said the match will now be played on November 15, 2015 - not October 11 as previously advertised. The trophy and medals to be presented to the winner have long been secured. 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh Sports News Follow Us It is not bravery that causes a man to climb a thorny tree,it is actually cowardice. By: big heart
